title: nerdey
author: nerdey
content: Hi!I need some designer to design a kind of badge for me. This is the gig: i need one badge to be awarded as NFT (Non-Fungible Token) to participants in a Contest. (POAP)What do i need the designer to deliver?The badge in PSD format so i can re-use it by changing some features by myself when i need it.Payment will be in USDT BEP20.Image Requirements:Recommended: measures 500x500px, round shape, size less than 200KB (Max. 4MB)Here an idea on what i need:https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/ygwtRWc_VETeHRahDMWS3L5huSbOhQITMi7nQTOcKECIiFXAn6mjFBMjZUvRm-2wOnm27gNo9astOUIJn_yLes2I3YvY4y8RC3olgLjfjMa13ZJhEjpgICMtO4Pza7XNGOwrO8RX

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I can help. Reach me on Telegram; @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Since you're paying in USDT Bep20 and not bitcoin, it's recommended to move this thread to Marketplace (Altcoins) because the Services section is only for bitcoin paying offers and services.And then, there goes the Overview of Bitcointalk Designers(Signature,Avatar,etc).These designers are not just limited to making signature designs and avatars. On that thread, it's listed what everyone is good at and those that are willing to accept USDT/altcoin.

comments.author: nerdey
comments.body: Quote from: sunsilk on March 08, 2023, 04:44:20 PMSince you're paying in USDT Bep20 and not bitcoin, it's recommended to move this thread to Marketplace (Altcoins) because the Services section is only for bitcoin paying offers and services.And then, there goes the Overview of Bitcointalk Designers(Signature,Avatar,etc).These designers are not just limited to making signature designs and avatars. On that thread, it's listed what everyone is good at and those that are willing to accept USDT/altcoin.Awesome! Thanks!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: I'm willing to take this job if you haven't got a designer 4hrs from now.DM me on telegram @rat03gopoh for a deal, while I'm off desk atm.

comments.author: payjoe93
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 01:53:55 AMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 02:06:14 AM by payjoe93
comments.body: Hi, i have experienced make Poap.. i have make a POAP for many various project, gitcoin, ethdenver, and much more.. Here my lastwork :https://github.com/payjoe93?tab=repositoriesTelegram : @payjoe93
